keyword: how many calories are in a white castle burger
title: How Many Calories in a White Castle Burger?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a white castle burger, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for their classic slider.
h1: How Many Calories in a White Castle Burger?
assumptions: Standard Original Slider: small steamed beef patty, bun, diced onions; no cheese or extras unless specified.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact recipe, and customizations. Check White Castle's official site or app for latest values.

quick_answer.text: A standard White Castle burger (Original Slider) has about 140 kcal and 6 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a white castle burger?
faqs.a: About 140 kcal for the standard Original Slider.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a White Castle burger?
faqs.a: Roughly 15 g carbs, 6 g protein, 6 g fat per burger.

faqs.q: Does a White Castle burger have trans fats?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat in their standard sliders.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a White Castle burger?
faqs.a: Around 380 mg per Original Slider, mostly from the bun and seasoning.

faqs.q: Are White Castle burgers lower calorie than other fast food?
faqs.a: Yes, their small sliders are around 140 kcal vs. larger burgers at 250+ kcal.
